system.description: Your indomitable will allows you to push through grievous wounds and debilitating effects through sheer force of determination.
system.benefit: Character can spend a Fate Point to ignore the effects of injury, Fatigue, and Stunning for a single combat encounter unless it results in their death. Doesn't prevent that damage occurring, just that the character can ignore its effects up until combat ends or the damage would kill them.

specialAbilities.name: Unstoppable
specialAbilities.description: Spend a Fate Point to ignore all effects of injury, Fatigue, and Stunning for one combat encounter (until combat ends or you die).
